author: Associated Press
title: CDC considers loosening guidelines for some already exposed to virus - Fox News
description: CDC considers loosening guidelines for some already exposed to virus Fox News CDC Weighs Loosening Guidelines for Some Exposed to Coronavirus Snopes.com CDC set to loosen back-to-work guidelines for some who self-isolate, Pence says CBS News CDC weighs loosen…
content:
WASHINGTON The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is considering changing its guidelines for self-isolation to make it easier for those who have been exposed to someone with the coronavirus to return to work if they are without symptoms.
